metadata.synopsis: Kathy, a secretive and rebellious teenager, wants only one thing: to escape from the psychiatric facility in which she has been locked up.

reviews: I did like this movie quite a lot... [A] wacky little movie.
I did not love this film, but I liked its energy.
Cavale remembers that behind anyone with a mental health problem is a human with dreams and goals.
"Cavale" is an imperfect film, but it's evidence that Gourmel will be a filmmaker to watch.
If some of its perils are contrived, Micha Wald's screenplay takes a more natural approach to the story's resolution, pulling back from the fate on-the-lam films often have in store.
As a trio, Viance, Zaghouani and Pellizari are bright and full of energy, and Gourmel allows their scenes together to play with improvisational looseness.
